radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild bilateral atelectasis, no pleural effusion. Numerous diverticula noted throughout the colon with areas of wall thickening and hyperemia in the mid sigmoid colon, extensive adjacent fat stranding, regional and distant pockets of free air scattered throughout the peritoneum, stranding adjacent to the urinary bladder, small bowel loops fluid filled but not abnormally dilated. No discrete fluid collection or bowel obstruction. Mild atherosclerotic calcification in the abdominal aorta.
